Davenport.Jumer's Casino & Hotel: Jumer's Casino & Hotel is a "Las Vegas style" casino-hotel located in Rock Island, Illinois, on the western edge of the state just off Interstate 280, 160 miles (260 km) southwest of Chicago, bordering the state of Iowa by the Mississippi River. It is part of a metropolitan area known as the Quad Cities, which comprises Rock Island and Moline, Illinois, and Davenport and Bettendorf, Iowa. Jumer's has over 42,000 square feet (3,900 m2) of gaming, containing 1,100 slot machines, 24 table games, live poker and a high limit slot room, all on one gaming floor.
